title: How to Find, Manage, and Hide Memories on Facebook

steps.title: Open the Facebook app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. It's a white "F" on a blue background.

steps.title: Tap the Menu ☰ button.
steps.content: Tap the Menu ☰ button. You'll see it at the top-right corner on Android, and the bottom-right on an iPhone or iPad.

steps.title: Tap Memories.
steps.content: Tap Memories . It's the clock and curved arrow icon in the upper-left area of the menu.

steps.title: Scroll through your memories.
steps.content: Scroll through your memories. You'll see different posts , photos , anniversaries, and content you were tagged in on today's date from past years. You can share a memory on your timeline by tapping Share below it.

steps.title: Tap Manage Settings at the top to customize your Memories.
steps.content: Tap Manage Settings at the top to customize your Memories. On this page, you can control whether you're notified of new Memories and filter out Memories involving certain Facebook users or dates.

steps.title: Manage your Facebook Memories notifications.
steps.content: Manage your Facebook Memories notifications. You can select All Memories to be notified every day a memory is shared, Highlights to only be notified of select memories, or None to stop seeing Memories notifications.

steps.title: Hide Memories from specific dates and/or people.
steps.content: Hide Memories from specific dates and/or people. If particular anniversaries and content might be painful to see, you can prevent Facebook from displaying Memories from specific dates and people. Tap People to choose people you don't want to see in your Memories. Tap Dates to omit certain dates from Memories.

steps.title: Open the Facebook website.
steps.content: Open the Facebook website . Doing so will open your News Feed if you're already logged into Facebook. If you aren't logged into Facebook , type in your email address (or phone number) and password in the top right corner of the page and click Log In .

steps.title: Click Memories in the left panel.
steps.content: Click Memories in the left panel. You'll see it just below "Friends" at the top-left corner of Facebook. If you don't see this option, click the blue "f" icon at the top-left corner to return to your feed first.

steps.title: Scroll through your memories.
steps.content: Scroll through your memories. You'll see different posts, photos, anniversaries, and content you were tagged in on today's date from past years. [1] X Research source To share a memory on your timeline, click Share below the memory. There is no longer a way to browse Facebook Memories from previous dates.

steps.title: Manage your Facebook Memories notifications.
steps.content: Manage your Facebook Memories notifications. Click Notifications in the left panel to choose whether to receive notifications of memories. You can select All Memories to be notified every day a Memory is shared, Highlights to only be notified of select memories, or None to stop seeing Memories notifications.

steps.title: Hide Memories from certain dates and/or people.
steps.content: Hide Memories from certain dates and/or people. If certain anniversaries and content might be painful to see, you can prevent Facebook from displaying Memories from specific dates and people. Click Hide People to choose people you don't want to see in your Memories. Click Hide Dates to omit certain dates from Memories.
